thread.section_title: The Bryant Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Accommodations
thread.title_full: Good Accommodations - Review of The Bryant Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: savoy555
title: Good Accommodations
text:
We travelled to NYC just for fun. This hotel is very nicely maintained and all aspects were well done. Our double was typically NYC compact but adequate. I do have to say the bathroom was very nice, spacious with a large tub and fabulous shower. The location at Bryant Park is convenient to many attractions.
Number one though is the staff. Very attentive and friendly.
We would definitely stay here again.
